pageContext.other: 2 different lumps are shown in the hand-drawn illustration., In the title, the word, LUMP has been superscribed (in different handwriting) over the words,  Laminated Concretion.  All these words should be in the plural, as the illustration clearly indicates 2 lumps., 3 lines under SITE have been written (in different handwriting and ink) over a white-out label.
pageContext.associations: 1--7; 1 mould for socketed celt; 4 Palstaves; 1 Ring; 2 Pieces of laminated concretion like wood.
